full_summary:
================================

# System Analyst Tender Announcement
================================

## Tender Overview
---------------

The Office of the Public Sector Integrity Commissioner of Canada is issuing an **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the provision of System Analyst services.

### Tender Details
----------------

* **Reference Number**: cb-843-99019217
* **Solicitation Number**: P2500020
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-14
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-24, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-05-24

### Contract Requirements
----------------------

The selected contractor will provide System Analyst services to support the Office's information technology (IT) operations.

### Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit (30%): The contractor's ability to understand and meet the technical requirements of the contract.
* Price (70%): The total cost of the contract, including any applicable taxes and fees.

### Contract Award Decision
-------------------------

The contract will be awarded to the contractor with the highest combined rating for Technical Merit and Price.

### Contract Terms
-----------------

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-06-10
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-08-31

### Important Dates
-----------------

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-24, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

### Contact
--------

For more information, please contact:

Kelsey Pilon
Phone: (343) 576-3940
Email: pilon.kelsey@psic-ispc.gc.ca


Trade Agreements
-----------------

This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
